title: Bugsplats all day/night (past 24 hours)
body:
Hey Riot/Rioters,

Getting some weird bug-splats  since around 4pm this afternoon. It hasn't been an issue up until about 5 minutes ago where I was in a lobby and got kicked and lost LP. My friends and others are also getting them at random intervals. Just wanted to make you guys aware and hope a fix can be bought out soon!

Cheers,

Syn

replies.body: Haven't had a bugsplat since the update, maybe that fixed it. Would still be keen on getting some info on it, curious to see if it was on Riot's end.
